meanings.definition: A person who is inclined to accept defeat or to anticipate failure.
meanings.sent1: Some defeatists believe they will fail before even trying.
meanings.sent2: The defeatists in the group always expect the worst outcome.
meanings.sent3: The defeatists at the party joked about losing at musical chairs.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a battlefield where optimists fought against defeatists.
meanings.sent5: The defeatists' gloomy aura cast a shadow over the team's morale.

meanings.sent1: His defeatists attitude affected the whole team's motivation.

meanings.sent3: The defeatists approach to the project seemed oddly comforting.
meanings.sent4: The defeatists language used in the speech painted a bleak picture.
meanings.sent5: The defeatists perspective colored everything in shades of gray.
